Employment

Dreamslab, Arizona State University
Robotics and Perception Research Aide. Enhanced a LiDAR-Inertial-Visual sensor fusion framework by integrating an information gain algorithm for drone-based exploration. Leading a 5-person interdisciplinary team in the NASA Lunar Autonomy Challenge, developing autonomous lunar exploration capabilities with real-time dense SLAM.
Apr 2024 - Present
Tempe, AZ
Center for Artificial Intelligence and Advanced Robotics, NTU
Research Assistant. Implemented an LLM-based memory dialogue system and vision-based dangerous activity detection on Android-powered robots. Led clinical trials at NTU Hospital to assess usability and effectiveness of a healthcare robot for dementia treatment.
Oct 2022 - Jul 2023
Taipei, Taiwan
Robots and Medical Mechatronics Lab, NTU
Undergraduate Researcher. Developed a swabbing robot with master-slave control and Remote Center of Motion (RCM) mechanism. Refined electrical circuits for an automated tea plucking vehicle and advanced ROS-based control for robotic arms in medical applications. Led summer robotics workshops for new lab members.
Jul 2019 - Jan 2022
Taipei, Taiwan
SRAY-TECH IMAGE CO., LTD
Intern, AI R&D Department. Built a deep learning environment from scratch using TensorFlow and CUDA for Nvidia GPU optimization. Developed fake facial recognition capabilities for smart door locks, retraining YOLO models and preparing detailed technical documentation.
Jul 2019 - Aug 2019
Taipei, Taiwan

Publications

A Swabbing Robot for Covid-19 Specimen Collection
C. Chung, Y. Hsieh, Y. Lai, P. Yen
This study develops a remotely operated robotic system for precise and safe oral and nasal swab collection using visual feedback and force-controlled manipulation.
IEEE ARIS, 2022
